biography.bio: Anneliese Uhlig was born on August 27, 1918 in Essen, Germany. She is an actress, known for Okay S.I.R. (1972), Immenhof (1994) and Coming Home (1998).
biography.name: Anneliese Uhlig

biography.placeOfBirth: Groß-Streitz, Pomerania, Germany [now Strzezenice, Zachodniopomorskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Paul Dahlke was born on April 12, 1904 in Groß-Streitz, Pomerania, Germany as Paul Victor Ernst Dahlke. He was an actor, known for Trois hommes dans la neige (1955), Flying Classroom (1954) and Confessions of Felix Krull (1957). He was married to Elfe Gerhart. He died on November 24, 1984 in Salzburg, Austria.
biography.name: Paul Dahlke

biography.bio: Anita Lochner was born on April 24, 1950 in Frankfurt am Main, Germany. She is an actress, known for Deep End (1970), La pluie noire (1972) and Le pain du boulanger (1976).
biography.name: Anita Lochner

biography.bio: Stefan Behrens was born on June 2, 1942 in Dresden, Germany. He is an actor, known for Der Hausgeist (1991), Von Liebe keine Rede (1971) and Der Urlaub (1968).
biography.name: Stefan Behrens

biography.bio: Helmut Förnbacher was born on January 26, 1936 in Basel, Switzerland. He is an actor and director, known for Youth (2015), Chasse aux renards interdite (1966) and Beyond Control (1968). He has been married to Kristina Nel since 1975.
biography.name: Helmut Förnbacher

biography.bio: Werner Kreindl was born on October 20, 1927 in Wels, Austria. He was an actor, known for Soko, brigade des stups (1978), Der Schüler Gerber (1981) and La formule (1980). He was married to Diana Körner. He died on June 6, 1992 in Wagrain, Austria.
biography.name: Werner Kreindl

biography.bio: Martina Mayne was born in 1925 in Berlin, Germany as Martina Schulhof. She was an actress, known for Captain Busby: The Even Tenour of Her Ways (1967), I'm a Stranger (1952) and Murder in the Cathedral (1951). She was married to David Thomson. She died in 2013.
biography.name: Martina Mayne

biography.placeOfBirth: Stettin, Pomerania, Germany [now Szczecin, Zachodniopomorskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Iska Geri was born on April 28, 1920 in Stettin, Pomerania, Germany. She was an actress, known for Oma ist noch besser (1965), Monpti (1957) and Große Liebe zum kleinen Chanson (1967). She was married to Ralph Werner Lorenz. She died on April 10, 2002 in Berlin, Germany.
biography.name: Iska Geri

biography.bio: Herbert Steinmetz was born on October 19, 1908 in Elstertrebnitz, Germany. He was an actor, known for Kommissariat IX (1975), Veronika Voss (1982) and Effi Briest (1974). He died on November 30, 1986 in Bremen, Germany.
biography.name: Herbert Steinmetz

biography.bio: Theo Lingen was born on June 10, 1903 in Hanover, Germany as Franz Theodor Schmitz. He was an actor and director, known for M (1931), Le testament du docteur Mabuse (1933) and Um eine Nasenlänge (1949). He was married to Marianne Zoff. He died on November 10, 1978 in Vienna, Austria.
biography.name: Theo Lingen

biography.bio: Hans Hermann Schaufuß was born on July 13, 1893 in Leipzig, Saxony, Germany. He was an actor, known for Eine einträgliche Stelle (1966), Zwei Genies (1934) and La ville dorée (1942). He died on January 30, 1982 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany.
biography.name: Hans Hermann Schaufuß

biography.bio: Hans Schweikart was born on October 1, 1895 in Berlin, Germany. He was a director and actor, known for Fasching (1939), Muß man sich gleich scheiden lassen? (1953) and Geschlossene Gesellschaft (1959). He was married to Carlotta Vetrone, Maria Kraushaar and Käthe Nevil. He died on December 1, 1975 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany.
biography.name: Hans Schweikart

biography.bio: Alf Marholm was born on May 31, 1918 in Oberhausen, Germany as Alf Marholm-Stoffels. He was an actor, known for The Black Forest Clinic (1985), Percy Stuart (1969) and Gesang für die Gerechten (1969). He died on February 24, 2006 in Waldbreitbach, Rhineland-Palatinate, Germany.
biography.name: Alf Marholm

biography.bio: Harry Kalenberg was born on March 3, 1921 in Cologne, Germany. He was an actor and director, known for Operation Walküre (1971), Biedermann und die Brandstifter (1967) and Die Geschichte von Joel Brand (1964). He died on August 12, 1993.
biography.name: Harry Kalenberg

biography.bio: Jochen Stern was born on September 13, 1928 in Frankfurt an der Oder, Germany. He is an actor, known for Good Bye Lenin! (2003), Aimee & Jaguar (1999) and Guys and Balls (2004).
biography.name: Jochen Stern

biography.bio: Hansjakob Gröblinghoff was born on April 5, 1902 in Bochum, Germany. He is an actor, known for Der Vetter Basilio (1969), Die Launen des Herrn Lasukow (1966) and Die 7-Tage-Woche des Drahtwebers Rolf Piechotta (1974).
biography.name: Hansjakob Gröblinghoff

biography.bio: Ulli Philipp was born on April 19, 1943 in Vienna, Austria. She is an actress, known for Deutschlandlied (1996), Der Sündenbock (1965) and Der Fall Wera Sassulitsch (1968). She was previously married to Tom Toelle.
biography.name: Ulli Philipp

biography.bio: Jutta Kammann was born on March 24, 1944 in Heidenheim/Brenz, Germany. She is an actress, known for In aller Freundschaft (1998), Eine Tote soll ermordet werden (1972) and Inspecteur Derrick (1974).
biography.name: Jutta Kammann

biography.bio: Werner Sindermann was born on February 11, 1928 in Vienna, Austria. He was an actor, known for Der müde Theodor (1979), Der Maulkorb (1979) and Paule Pauländer (1976). He died in 1980 in Neuss, Germany.
biography.name: Werner Sindermann

biography.bio: John Herrington is an actor, known for A Shot in the Dark (1964), Billion Dollar Brain (1967) and The Bofors Gun (1968).
biography.name: John Herrington
